<tr>
<td valign=3D"top">When you label th=
e files with what you heard, you influence the listener to try to hear what=

to know what people really hear without your hints, you need to send them o=
ut unlabeled.<br><br><br>--- On <b>Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@aol. com <i><=
